Class DefaultPortRenderer

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.PortRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Default port renderer that creates circular port visuals. This is the standard port appearance used by FlowGraph.

public class DefaultPortRenderer : IPortRenderer

Creates the visual representation for a port.

The port data to render.

The parent node.

GetSize(Port, Node, FlowCanvasSettings)

Gets the size of the port visual in pixels (before scaling). Return null to use the default port size from settings.
